name: Choose Them Up
description:
Choose Them Up is a game made with unity for the Ludum dare 42
The jam's theme was Running out of space

Choose Them Up is a small Shoot 'em up where you need to reach the highest stage and deafeat the boss.
To improve your spaceship, you can loot upgrades on enemies, but be careful, if your inventory is full, to equipe one, you need to destroy two already equiped if your inventory is full.
In normal mode, you gain one more slot for upgrade per stage. Not in hardcore.

Good luck !

The jam version only works with controler !

Changelog for the post jam and web version :
- Better feedback when the player is hit
- Fix bug on victory menu
- Balancing
- Final boss come back every 10 stages
- Mouse and keyboard support

Code and Graphisms : Nicolas LAURENT
Sounds and Musics : Aurélien MONTERO
Title and fix : Antoine SEMBLAT
